definition: to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: The ferry service of bygone days has been replaced by that tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 往日的渡口已被那個隧道取代。

sentences.english: With their breath comes the memory of my old day songs.
sentences.chinese: 花氣芬芳勾起我對往日歌曲的記憶。

sentences.english: The past country estate is yet their warm homestead today.
sentences.chinese: 往日的田園依舊是今日溫馨家園。

sentences.english: The pleasant old days often recurred to me.
sentences.chinese: 往日的歡樂景象常常浮現在我的腦海。

sentences.english: I was drunker than I ought to be by midnight, so I said I was going for a walk.
sentences.chinese: 我酒醉得比往日厲害，因此說自己打算出去散會兒步。

sentences.english: The vendor, who also peddles pet turtles, says she is selling more of the stuff these days.
sentences.chinese: 販售小甲魚的攤販告訴我們，她最近賣得比往日好。

sentences.english: In the boundless huge crowd, find the old familiar figure.
sentences.chinese: 在茫茫人海中，找着往日熟悉的背影。

sentences.english: All ancients created the prosperousness of Guoyu.
sentences.chinese: 郭峪往日的繁榮是由傑出的古人創造的。

sentences.english: You are dressed more bright than usual today.
sentences.chinese: 你今天穿得真鮮麗，跟你往日的風格截然不同。

sentences.english: The recollection loosened a throng of benumbed sensations.
sentences.chinese: 往日的回憶使已麻木的各種感覺一同湧上心頭。

sentences.english: But now back in mid-summer London, I can see that people have regained confidence.
sentences.chinese: 如今仲夏的倫敦，人們又恢復了往日的從容和自信。

sentences.english: Floodwaters formed a giant, arc-shaped lake on what was normally cultivated land.
sentences.chinese: 洪水在往日的耕地上形成了一個巨大的弧形湖泊。

sentences.english: Evidently he expected to restore their old friendship at once and without modification.
sentences.chinese: 很顯然，他是想立刻原原本本地恢復他們往日的交情。

sentences.english: Yesterday's laughter was dusty deep in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 往日的笑語也已稀落，塵封在心。

sentences.english: I find my lost youth again. And the strange and beautiful song. H. W.
sentences.chinese: 當我又縈迴於那往日的夢跡，我再度找到失去的青春。

sentences.english: Colorful past of the earth into a powder makeup jade puzzle world.
sentences.chinese: 往日絢麗多彩的大地變成了粉妝玉砌的世界。

definition: to obliterate completely/to vanish from the face of the earth
to be a different person/not to be one's usual self
